meanings.definition: A strong alcoholic drink made from bananas or other fruits.
meanings.sent1: The villagers enjoyed sipping on waragi during their celebration.
meanings.sent2: He bought a bottle of waragi to share with his friends at the party.

meanings.sent5: The colorful label on the waragi bottle caught her eye, promising a flavorful experience.
